name: Drama
0:
”Alexa, start drama sound”
”Alexa, open drama sound”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drama sound
Developer Terms of Use
des: Did you ever feel that need to add some drama to your conversations? Your kids telling you how cruel it is to be without working WLAN? Your mother in law telling you she'll never visit you again? Well... now you can add a lot of drama and end all that conversations with this great skill. Simply start by yelling "Alexa, start drama!".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
